The Division manages state-supported Amtrak services, capital investments, federal and state grant programs, transit operations outside Greater Boston, and partnerships with key stakeholders across New England.%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EPosition Summary%3C/strong%3E%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3EThe MassDOT Rail and Transit Division oversees the Commonwealth%27s 15 Regional Transit Authorities, MassDOT%27s freight and passenger rail program and works closely with the MBTA. The Rail %26amp; Transit Intern will work the Manager of Transit Programs and the Transit Project Manager to support a variety of initiatives.%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EDuties %26amp; Responsibilities%3C/strong%3E%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cul style=%22margin-top:0in;%22 type=%22disc%22%3E%3Cli class=%22MsoNormal%22 href=%22https://massanf.taleo.net/enterprise/mass.gov/massdot-careers%22 target=%22_blank%22 rel=%22noopener noreferrer%22%3EMassachusetts Department of Transportation (MassDOT)%3C/a%3E%26nbsp;takes great pride in connecting the Commonwealth’s residents and communities. MassDOT is responsible for developing, implementing, and coordinating transportation policies and projects for the Commonwealth of Massachusetts and to efficiently plan, design, construct, and maintain a safe statewide transportation system which effectively meets the transportation needs of the Commonwealth. Information about MassDOT’s inclusive culture and career opportunities can be found at%26nbsp;%3Ca href=%22https://www.mass.gov/massdot-careers%22 target=%22_blank%22 rel=%22noopener noreferrer%22%3Emass.gov/massdot-careers%3C/a%3E.%3Cu1:p%3E%3C/u1:p%3E%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp%3EMassDOT’s divisions include: Highway, Registry of Motor Vehicles, Aeronautics, and Rail %26amp; Transit. Headquarters (Planning %26amp; Enterprise Services) provides business and administrative support and policy leadership for each of the four (4) divisions.%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp%3E%26nbsp;%3C/p%3E','!*!%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout the MassDOT Rail %26amp; Transit Division%3C/strong%3E%3Co:p%3E%3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3E%3Co:p%3E %3C/o:p%3E%3C/p%3E%3Cp class=%22MsoNormal%22%3EThe MassDOT Rail %26amp; Transit Division oversees the Commonwealth’s passenger rail, freight rail, and Regional Transit Authorities (RTAs).
